name: Calendar
description: Date picker and calendar widgets for single, range, and multi selection.

use: you need date selection with single/range/multi modes.
you want a themed calendar grid.
avoid: you only need a simple text date field.

examples.minimal:
Calendar(
  view: CalendarView.now(),
  selectionMode: CalendarSelectionMode.single,
  onChanged: (value) {},
)

patterns.title: Range selection
patterns.code:
Calendar(
  view: CalendarView.now(),
  selectionMode: CalendarSelectionMode.range,
  value: CalendarValue.range(
    DateTime.now(),
    DateTime.now().add(const Duration(days: 7)),
  ),
  onChanged: (value) {},
)

patterns.title: Dialog picker
patterns.code:
DatePickerDialog(
  initialViewType: CalendarViewType.date,
  selectionMode: CalendarSelectionMode.single,
  onChanged: (value) {},
)

theming: `CalendarTheme` controls spacing, colors, and typography for the grid.
accessibility: Provide clear focus states and labels for date buttons.
do: Use `CalendarSelectionMode` to enforce desired selection behavior.
